author: TravisEz13
body:
## PR Summary

Update ThirdPartyNotices
  - update the TPN in license.rtf
  - add the additional attributions needed to generate the TPN

## PR Checklist

- [x] [PR has a meaningful title](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
    - Use the present tense and imperative mood when describing your changes
- [x] [Summarized changes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
- [x] [Change is not breaking](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#making-breaking-changes)
- [x] [Make sure all `.h`, `.cpp`, `.cs`, `.ps1` and `.psm1` files have the correct copyright header](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
- [x] This PR is ready to merge and is not [Work in Progress](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---work-in-progress).
    - If the PR is work in progress, please add the prefix `WIP:` to the beginning of the title and remove the prefix when the PR is ready.
- **User-facing changes**
    - [x] Not Applicable
    - **OR**
    - [ ] User-facing [Documentation needed](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#pull-request---submission)
        - [ ] Issue filed - Issue link:
- **Testing - New and feature**
    - [x] Not Applicable or can only be tested interactively
    - **OR**
    - [ ] [Make sure you've added a new test if existing tests do not effectively test the code changed](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md#before-submitting)
        - [ ] [Add `[feature]` if the change is significant or affects feature tests](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/testing-guidelines/testing-guidelines.md#requesting-additional-tests-for-a-pr)

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
@RDIL 	What part of the Head specifically is missing?  I can give this feedback to the teams that generates this.
Existing head section:
```html
<head><title>THIRD PARTY SOFTWARE NOTICES AND INFORMATION</title><style>pre{white-space:pre-wrap;background:#eee;padding:24px}</style></head>
```

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body:
Stuff such as meta tags like (charset, description, etc) (can’t say the raw
tags because I’m on mobile now)

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
@dabutvin Can you see the feedback about the TPN at https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/8415#issuecomment-445943157 
Is there somewhere I can file these issues?

comments.author: dabutvin
comments.body:
The generator we are using here is based on a project from amzn and we should probaly fix the default html template if there are issues with it or improvements to be had.

https://github.com/amzn/tiny-attribution-generator/blob/master/default-htmltemplate.hbs#L4-L17

Feel free to open issues and/or PRs over there.

Also, after looking at your changes here, if you would prefer to keep the notice file in TXT format there is an option to generate in TXT instead of HTML - there's a new toggle switch on the generator you can switch

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: thanks for the heads up that we can generate `txt` now @dabutvin. I updated the PR.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Verified license is readable in MSI.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @TravisEz13 What is right `CL-` label for the PR?

title: Update Third Party Notices
